thread.title: Chuba Akpom to join Brighton on loan
thread.title_full: Chuba Akpom to join Brighton on loan

title: Chuba Akpom to join Brighton on loan
text:
Chuba will join Brighton for the rest of the season Chuba Akpom to join Brighton on loan 
Chuba Akpom will join Championship leaders Brighton & Hove Albion on loan for remainder of the season. 
The promising young striker played his part in Hull City’s promotion to the Premier League last term, making 36 league appearances, and will be hoping to do the same with Chris Hughton’s side this time around. 
An England youth international, Chuba, 21, has been with us since the age of six. 
The loan is subject to the completion of regulatory processes.   30 Jan 2017 We'll be heading to Gander Green Lane in the fifth round of the Emirates FA Cup to face non-league side Features Access to all Arsenal Player VideosReceive the digital member e-newsletter Email Address or Arsenal Membership number Red, Silver, Gold, Platinum and Junior Gunner Members should log in using your membership number Password Forgotten Password?
